DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate effectiveness antidepressant treatment non-psychotic major depressive disorder ( MDD ) Korea . The study divide MDD patient 3 level group accord past history treatment compare effectiveness various treatment regimen level . The treatment level group : 1 ) patient never treat appropriate medication current depressive symptom , 2 ) receive appropriate SSRI ( Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor ) respond , 3 ) receive two type SSRI antidepressant treatment without much effect reduce depressive symptom . The first level group treat single SSRI antidepressant treatment . The second third level group , receive SSRI treatment , treat alternative SSRI antidepressant ( switch ) , combine multiple SSRI treatment ( antidepressant combination ) , SSRI treatment combine mood stabilizer anti-psychotics ( augmentation ) . This study use placebo . Patients visit 5 time 6 week level treatment . Patients evaluated severity depressive symptom , functional level , side effect visit . Afterwards , investigation combine monitor patient depressive symptom every 3 month next 24 month . 18 nationwide university hospital participate study . This multi-site , prospective , naturalistic study patient depression Korea main project 'Clinical Research Center Depression ' fund Ministry Health , Welfare , Family Affairs ( MIHWAF ) Korea highly-qualified research achievement .
